Reviews.Title: Soooooo does it have a backlit keyboard or not?
Reviews.Author: Brian Simpson
Reviews.Content: First - Bought through Appletech.  They did everything in their power to make it a positive buying experience.  My transaction with that company was great.Second - It's a laptop all right.  Speakers are great.  Windows 8 tiles seem pointless.  Webcam is fine.  Two weeks in and the computer already seems to lag a bit when downloading, starting applications, or loading webpages, but who knows where in the process it's being slowed down.  All in all it's a good computer, but what gets me is the backlit keyboard.  It doesn't have one!  It's sold as having one, has a sticker right on the wrist-rest that says it has one, but the S55-A5176 does NOT have backlit keys.  If it does (as some reviews have said) it's hidden so well that it might as well not exist.  I've scoured the interwebs and found no cntrl key combo that works, no BIOS setting to flip at startup, nothing.  It doesn't take away from the experience, but what's up with that?

Reviews.Title: Well-equipped and powerful!  An elegant laptop at a bargain price
Reviews.Author: Abi Vojdani
Reviews.Content: Came on time, indeed earlier than expected. It is one very powerful laptop. A bargain! .Setting it up was a breeze. I have tried every feature/option this system offers: flawless! I am Extremely satisfied and would recommend it to anybody who is serious about computing.

Reviews.Title: Needed as advertised a Backlit keyboard.
Reviews.Author: William Vanacore
Reviews.Content: Sticker say's Backlit Raised Tile Keyboard w/10-Key. Say's all s50 Series has this. False advertising !!! Most of my work is done in lowlight conditions and this was a very good reason to purchase this unit. I had looked at touchscreen models and chose this one based on the keyboard. Would have rated excellant except for this major problem. Can you help me with this major problem ?? I am very upset and have already installed my programs as I needed to use it promptly !!!

Reviews.Title: Great computer!
Reviews.Author: Tomas Pozzebon
Reviews.Content: The comuputer works perfectly, its the truth all that it says included!Recommended to all the people! Love it !

Reviews.Title: Nice but not top class
Reviews.Author: SamPup
Reviews.Content: The laptop is well designed but the case and monitor edges are not well mated.  When one catches an edge, it makes one feel they are separating. The apps have too many ads which is bothersome.
